result.execSummary:
The defendant Lee A Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid at $50.00 per month commencing 07-01-2016 or serve 5 days jail as penalty for non payment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lee A Jones

records.addlTxt: Transcript received and filed for the following date and event: Hearing 3/2/16

Defendant Lee A Jones in court with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Defendant was sentenced as follows:   Count #2:
HUBER: 30 days (Defendant to report to the Huber Facility by 6:00 p.m. on May 11, 2016.)
COSTS: $243.00 to be paid at $50.00 per month commencing 7/1/16, 5 days jail consecutive as penalty for non payment).
Sentencing hearing on May 2, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Lee A Jones in court with Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court quashes warrant and re-instates bail.  State files an amended information.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #2 on amended information.  Court performs plea colloquy with Defendant and finds Defendant guilty of Count #2 on amended information.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Weathers makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court adjourns sentencing so Defendant's other case can be settled.  Bail remains as fixed.
Bail/bond hearing on March 16, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 1000.00.

Branch 9 Only.
Code 1

Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers in court.   Defendant Lee A Jones did not appear.   Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant did not appear, case was set for 3:45 P.M., case was called at 3:48 p.m.  Based on defendant's non appearance, Court orders bail be revoked and forfieted.  Court issues capias.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 03-14-2016 03:45 pm

Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers in court.   Defendant Lee A Jones did not appear.   Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.     Attorney Weathers advises the Court that the Defendant is ready to resolve the case and requests the Court set the matter for plea and sentencing.  The State requests the Court issue a capias.  The Court issues but stays a capias until the next hearing and sets the matter for disposition.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 14, 2016 at 03:45 pm.
